ITEM.name: paired_read_lib
ITEM.description: File with interlaced reads for paired-read library

ITEM.name: paired_read_lib_unpaired
ITEM.description: File with interlaced reads with unpaired reads from paired-end library

ITEM.name: mate_pair_lib
ITEM.description: File with interlaced reads for mate-pair library

ITEM.name: single_read_lib
ITEM.description: File for single-read library

ITEM.name: pacbio
ITEM.description: File with PacBio CLR reads for hybrid assembly

ITEM.name: nanopore
ITEM.description: File with Oxford Nanopore reads for hybrid assembly

ITEM.name: sanger
ITEM.description: File with Sanger reads for hybrid assembly

ITEM.name: output_dir
ITEM.description: Output prefix of results

ITEM.name: paired_read_or
ITEM.description: Orientation of reads for paired-end library, the default orientation for paired-end libraries is forward-reverse.

ITEM.name: mate_pair_or
ITEM.description: Orientation of reads for mate-pair library, the default orientation for mate-pair libraries is reverse-forward.

ITEM.name: single_cell
ITEM.description: This flag is required for MDA (single-cell) data.

ITEM.name: meta
ITEM.description: This flag is recommended when assembling metagenomic data sets (runs metaSPAdes).

ITEM.name: plasmid
ITEM.description: This flag is required when assembling only plasmids from WGS data sets (runs plasmidSPAdes).

ITEM.name: rna
ITEM.description: This flag should be used when assembling RNA-Seq data sets (runs rnaSPAdes).

ITEM.name: iontorrent
ITEM.description: This flag is required when assembling IonTorrent data. Allows BAM files as input.

ITEM.name: version
ITEM.description: Prints SPAdes version.

ITEM.name: only_ec
ITEM.description: Performs read error correction only.

ITEM.name: only_assembly
ITEM.description: Runs assembly module only.

ITEM.name: no_gzip
ITEM.description: Forces read error correction module not to compress the corrected reads. If this options is not set, corrected reads will be in *.fastq.gz format.

ITEM.name: careful
ITEM.description: Tries to reduce the number of mismatches and short indels. Also runs MismatchCorrector â€“ a post processing tool, which uses BWA tool. This option is recommended only for assembly of small genomes.

ITEM.name: threads
ITEM.description: Number of threads

ITEM.name: memory
ITEM.description: Set memory limit in Gb. SPAdes terminates if it reaches this limit.

ITEM.name: kmers
ITEM.description: Comma-separated list of k-mer sizes to be used (all values must be odd, less than 128 and listed in ascending order).

ITEM.name: cov_cutoff
ITEM.description: Read coverage cutoff value. Must be a positive float value, or 'auto', or 'off'. Default value is 'off'. When set to 'auto' SPAdes automatically computes coverage threshold using conservative strategy.

ITEM.name: phred_offset
ITEM.description: Alignment match score.
